com.isotrol.impe3.api
Interface PageResolver

public interface PageResolver

Interface for custom page routers inside a portal. It should be implemented as a connector.

Method Summary
 PageURI getPath(Portal portal, Route route)
          Prepares a custom path for a page inside a portal.
 ResolvedPage getRoute(PageResolutionParams params)
          Resolves a custom route inside a portal.
 

Method Detail

getRoute

ResolvedPage getRoute(PageResolutionParams params)
Resolves a custom route inside a portal.

Parameters:
params - Resolution params.
Returns:
The custom route or null if the standard routing should proceed.

getPath

PageURI getPath(Portal portal,
                Route route)
Prepares a custom path for a page inside a portal.

Parameters:
portal - Portal.
route - Route.
Returns:
A list of decoded path segments if a custom path if desired or null if not.
